From: ' 
To: "Martin G. Weinberg" <I 
Cc: 
, "Miller, Michael", Reid Weingarten 
Subject: Re: US v Epstein 
Date: Wed, 14 Aug 2019 20:41:45 +0000 
Marty, 
That time works for us, thanks. Could you please circulate a dial-in? 
Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 14, 2019, at 11:23 AM, Martin O. Weinberg 
.-
wrote:
Alex, Mike and I are authorized to continue the discussion of potential civil forfeiture issues with you. Are you available 
at 930 tomorrow morning? Thanks 
Martin G. Weinberg, Esq. 
Boston, MA 02116 
 This Electronic Message contains information from the Law 
Office of Martin G. Weinberg, P.C., and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the 
addressee only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of 
the contents of this message is prohibited. 
EFTA00024407
